_comment: FY2024 Survey Answer Schema - stores only answers, questions are in template

engagement_grid._comment: G1: Who was engaged and how

engagement_descriptions.barriers_people_who_use_drugs: The Town of West Boylston is a member Town of the Worcester Regional Public Health Alliance. The Alliance is currently in the planning stages of how to expend these funds. Therefore, we have not engaged these populations at this time.
engagement_descriptions.barriers_people_in_recovery: The Town of West Boylston is a member Town of the Worcester Regional Public Health Alliance. The Alliance is currently in the planning stages of how to expend these funds. Therefore, we have not engaged these populations at this time.
engagement_descriptions.barriers_families: The Town of West Boylston is a member Town of the Worcester Regional Public Health Alliance. The Alliance is currently in the planning stages of how to expend these funds. Therefore, we have not engaged these populations at this time.

behavioral_health_assessment._comment: G3: How behavioral health needs were assessed
behavioral_health_assessment.other_methods: The Town of West Boylston is a member Town of the Worcester Regional Public Health Alliance. The Alliance is currently in the planning stages of how to expend these funds. Therefore, we have not identified these needs at this time.
behavioral_health_assessment.barriers: The Town of West Boylston is a member Town of the Worcester Regional Public Health Alliance. The Alliance is currently in the planning stages of how to expend these funds. Therefore, we have not addressed these barriers at this time.
